Html:
Hi guys,

I saw that the last release of source code is out-dated. Last version available is 1.1.1212.23 .

It's possible to have the last release source code available?

Thanks

Have you voted on the issue here? We've been asking for this for a while.
DCourtel, I saw your post on StackOverflow here and would like to see the source code updated so I could try to help.
